title: Disney Movie - Escape from the Dark (1977)
description:
The title The Littlest Horse Thieves was used in this films release in the United States, and Escape from the Dark was used in Europe. I&#039;ve always found this movie a little sad, but it&#039;s probably more realistic then most Disney movies of this era. Enjoy

NOTE: One way to help with the audio hiss is to adjust the ffdshow audio decoder equalizer settings. Drop the "16000" setting on the far right to meet your liking, it helps quite a bit.

When the owner of a Yorkshire coal-mine decides to mechanize to increase profits, the mine&#039;s pit ponies are scheduled to be destroyed. So, three children plan to steal them to keep them safe. But when they&#039;re caught, it&#039;s up to the mine owners and the miners themselves to decide what&#039;s right.
